        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">

    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="65738" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="65738" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.26</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="2662">2,662</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="396"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Orphéon Eau de Parfum</b> by <b>Diptyque</b> is a Woody Chypre fragrance for women and men. <b>Orphéon Eau de Parfum</b> was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Pescheux. Top note is Juniper Berries; middle note is Jasmine; base notes are Powdery Notes, Cedar and Tonka Bean. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this                     </div>
                    </div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="65738"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.143.jpg" style="width: 4.4rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bagas-de-Zimbro-143.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Juniper Berries</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89059960754954; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 3.25rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Jasmine</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.482.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Powdery-Notes-482.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Powdery Notes</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94954853712222; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.41.jpg" style="width: 3.625rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cedar-41.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cedar</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.73.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tonka-Bean-73.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tonka Bean</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="65738"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='e87b095f9adce3a11fe52873893255ba466' slotpayload='{"ct":"iSRKVaKxL7LBHsfy0j2lGq5ncOhEcnUEr79RxIKHQphTjB+eM8lSzJjOsh5cQdibglfDQ9HgluavKTHBp+7iv\/tzNr6WL\/Ir0gblPL0nhZBKD3B5Ji7FC3V7Rz1RLrXqxZiq1Br\/2XwXi3fxNOD0B0TBHUCGF6MUJe2ASC1sOCxcs1BTdXl4by9XaLwJt41c\/qVFu4PszN+1YKX4dg7FPuYJuRTUo1eBI1nf+dzsgoniolr2cUQpZRmzZOCzkNbSlPGpQeQoUAeKIwmXZ+eBIEDk6k1vfgQZu4kqiFUnLax3ImTSwVraAFLcrGUziKMkausgLNGFEHaj14kX0y7qug==","iv":"a2ff33b2d83fee4f5e377ad831cd4730","s":"e0942a8bf7a6f9ab"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

        </a>
        <p>by <i>Elena Knezevic</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            04/02/21 14:54
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">33</span>
</div>
<div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/14759/news.14759-120x120.jpg" alt="The New Orphéon by Diptyque Shows Multiple Facets: Woody, Floral and Green" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/The-New-Orpheon-by-Diptyque-Shows-Multiple-Facets-Woody-Floral-and-Green-14759.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>The New Orphéon by Diptyque Shows Multiple Facets: Woody, Floral and Green</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Sophie Normand</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            03/08/21 17:11
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">8</span>
</div>

</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371449" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371449" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BeauBleue"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1223146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BeauBleue" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371449ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371449" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223146">BeauBleue</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733393813" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Second review: I keep returning to Orphéon as a tonic for all the samey ambrofix / santal minimalist niches and vanilla-heavy designer frags. It puts a beautiful spin on the 'your skin but better' style by giving an airy woodland vibe. It smells like radiant skin after you've spent the day walking through the forest in springtime. Someone below mentioned that it's 'matte' in texture and they've hit the nail on the head there. No dupes and for good reason - it's a masterpiece. I just wish it lasted a bit longer than 5 hours (max) and came in a 100ml bottle (if you want to wear this every day you'll be buying it twice a year, which I probably will until a similar frag comes along). <br />
<br />
The solid version seems like an expensive novelty - it simply isn't strong enough to be smelled, even when you put your nose right up to your skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2371449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2371449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2371125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371125" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sarxoxo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sarxoxo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201186">sarxoxo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-04"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733360987" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a fancy shower gel at a fancy spa . Juniper berries with a dry -matte- like smell of woods. Ehh , incredible. <br />
I can smell this on a man or a woman wearing an elegant all white or all black outfit with nice loafers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2371125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2371125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368582" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2368582" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="totorodile"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2143004"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="totorodile" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Matcha-Meditation-64805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Matcha Meditation"title="Matcha Meditation"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2368582ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2368582" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2143004">totorodile</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 15:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do agree that it's beautiful and i would love to wear it regularly but the powdery notes can just be too strong and trigger migraines for me so tread carefully if you are sensitive to that type of thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2368582"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2368582#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2368161" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heyjordanwatts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579482"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1579482.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heyjordanwatts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Goldfield-Banks-Australia/Ingenious-Ginger-81895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ingenious Ginger"title="Ingenious Ginger"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2368161ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2368161" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579482">heyjordanwatts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 08:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Refined yet effortless; distinct yet familiar. I was expecting a more photorealistic juniper tree or a gin cocktail, but the opening read fruity to me (juniper berry vs juniper tree). While it opens tart and peppery, it settles into a clean powdery and slightly smoky scent that is distinctly perfume. By that, I mean that it doesn’t smell like anything in specific but rather the notes all work together to create a blend that is greater than the sum of its parts (I believe that is sorta the DNA of a chypre fragrance). Want to upgrade to a travel size. <br />
<br />
(De-scent-ber 2024: Day 1)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2368161"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2368161#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367802" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ganushia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1886298"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ganushia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1886298">Ganushia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 00:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I fell in love with this fragrance in a store when I was looking for something new that could be my birthday present. Orpheon was definitely something else, truly divine on my skin. Without thinking twice I bought it, brought it home and... I cried. It smelled like my grandma's closet. So I put it away and forgot about it for a few weeks and just a few days ago reached for it again. It smells amazing now! What a relief. For me it's definitely a *sexy time* fragrance, probably the sultriest one I owe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2367802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2367802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2367125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367125" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Promiw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343875"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Promiw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343875">Promiw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 08:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Incredible unisex fragrance. The juniper berry opening is so exquisite, one of the best openers. It then dries down in a powdery sense into a more calm and mature scent. I see this as an everyday signature fragrance. Really doesnt bother anyone because projection and sillage is not that powerful. Lasts 8-10 hours on my skin, but at 5 hours it turns into more of a skin scent. Worth a buy for the price. I need a bottle ASAP<br />
<br />
Verdict - 8.8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2367125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2367125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366987" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366987" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ryle__ugarte"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343686"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2343686.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ryle__ugarte" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366987ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366987" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2343686">ryle__ugarte</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 05:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this fragrance started it all for me. a big hit of a chic gin cocktail (thanks to the juniper) and mild tobacco in the opening, that mellows romantically into a soft powder. a big compliment grabber that stays all night.<br />
<br />
i was so obsessed with this release because of the whole package: it being inspired by parisian nightclubs, plus even having a song by Lewisofman to evoke it's spirit being made. it got me so hoooked! and when the time came that i got to smell it for the first time, i saw the whole picture. a bustling cocktail bar filled with people who talk at just the right volume, so you can still here the jazz band playing in the background. smiles and smirks all around, trying to see where they can get their senses filled for the night. a fairly plain crowd pleaser nonetheless, orpheon will always be the one for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2366987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2366987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364290" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jess.sophie.cluse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490409"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490409.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jess.sophie.cluse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364290ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364290" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490409">jess.sophie.cluse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 13:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I was looking for something to wear instead of Glossier You, I went around smelling everything from designer scents to the weirdest niche perfumes. Nothing stood out to me, I couldn't get on board with any of it. I said to my friend at the time that I was looking for something that was warm and cold at the same time, something balanced but interesting, a bit powdery but somehow still fizzy. Something skin like, by which I meant not sweet, gourmand, not floral, not citrusy, not oriental, not overtly woody etc. Something that smelt natural and human but not in a BO way. Orphéon ticks all those boxes for me, it is cozy from the tonka but fresh from the juniper, it's a bit spicy but not overpoweringly so. It's intriguing enough to want more, if you catch a whiff you want to follow it, and it smells like a perfume that has been lived in and worn in. I think this is a great contender for a signature scent, cause unless someone else is wearing it, no one will smell like you but everyone will more or less like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2364290"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2364290#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361319" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="leatherorrisviolet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1048023"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="leatherorrisviolet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Paris-Hilton/Gold-Rush-Man-41567.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41567.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold Rush Man"title="Gold Rush Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361319ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361319" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1048023">leatherorrisviolet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 19:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is like a Dior Sauvage or Bleu de Chanel that has been modified to be unisex leaning feminine</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2361319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2361319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359976" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359976" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JuliaToothFairy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2026472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JuliaToothFairy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359976ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359976" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472">JuliaToothFairy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 12:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Orpheon smells like intense gin, juniper berries, and cozy powder, powdery cedar wood.<br />
As time passes by, these notes blend more and more together, becoming less individual. At some point, they blend so much, you can't smell them separately, but instead, you smell a clean laundry, clothes softener scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2359976"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2359976#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359553" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emevelinee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2280133"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2280133.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emevelinee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Emerald-Thyme-Cologne-90256.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90256.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emerald Thyme Cologne"title="Emerald Thyme Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359553ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359553" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2280133">emevelinee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 04:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to admit this was a blind buy- and not one that I regret. this is such a perfectly fresh, just-out-of-the-shower scent. this reminds me of a cozy winter morning and is what I'd recommend if someone asked me for a 'clean-girl scent'. <br />
However I totally get people saying this isn't for them- I too was a bit confused the first time I opened the bottle, but now I love it to death.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2359553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2359553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358655" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maya lilac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maya lilac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705079">Maya lilac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like powdery scents but I think that Orpheon is too much for me. It’s mostly a blend of powder with jasmine, woods and tonka beans. Signature worthy for people who love this scent DNA. It’s a very sensual, soft, clean, soapy scent.<br />
<br />
Very understated and elegant, true to Diptique’s style of perfumery, that Parisian effortless way of being, which I can appreciate even if it’s not necessarily my vibe. You need to be really into powdery perfumes in order to wear Orpheon. It’s overly powdery with soft jasmine and unsweetened vanilla.  Don’t know why and how but in deep dry down feels both powdery and soapy. Very cosy and comforting style of perfume,  that would accompany you in a rainy, cold and gloomy fall day. It’s in the category of fragrances I like,  but I wouldn’t buy. Not for me, but very, very well done.<br />
<br />
The more I test perfumes, the more I start to feel like many of them fit into the larger and larger category of fragrances that “I wouldn’t spend my money on it, but I would totally wear it if it were gifted”! <br />
<br />
Feminine leaning for sure, with moderate longevity and sillage for the first hour. After the initial hour, it’s getting soft, but lingers on the skin. I’d say overpriced because of the way it performs, but it definitely smells expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2358655"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2358655#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2358455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358455" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maraschinocream"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1825819"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1825819.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maraschinocream" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1825819">maraschinocream</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 05:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I always hesitate to say I have a favorite fragrance or a signature scent but if I absolutely had to choose, orpheon would be it. this is powdery but in the absolute best way, and manages to find a perfect balance of sexy but clean. feels like touching up my makeup in the bathroom of a very expensive bar, then going back to my booth and sipping on an icy, gin-heavy cocktail. orpheon you will always be famous!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2358455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2358455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357839" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357839" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marlathecat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2286229"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marlathecat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357839ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357839" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2286229">Marlathecat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a collection of Diptyque fragrances and I love them all so was going to blind buy it based on the good reviews. Then I was near Mecca so decided to try it anyway, turned out it was more off putting than pleasant to me. Smells exactly like old people’s bathroom in the 90s - super soapy and powdery all the way then it has this weird bitter urine smell in the end. So weird like an old grandpa accidentally peed on himself then tried to use grandma’s powder to cover up the smell. I do like some old grandma fragrances like Opium, Shalimar, Cinnabar, but I don’t get this one at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2357839"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2357839#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353471" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tay.sor17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2328045"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2328045.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tay.sor17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353471ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353471" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2328045">tay.sor17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 16:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>when i first got this i didnt really get it. it was too powdery for my tastes. but after trying it again recently i feel crazy for not liking it before. it feels like a rainy autumn day, while wearing an elegant black outfit. i love this scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2353471"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2353471#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Took me a second to understand I smell like a 70s Paris bar and I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2347452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2347452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345816" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Love the house of Diptyque and as a man I find this fragrance to be one that will set you apart from other men. Everyone's experience with fragrances varies but I got well over 9+ hours of longevity on skin and clothing. The juniper berry 🫐 in this fragrance is outstanding and that jasmine is phenomenal along with powdery notes and woods makes this a masterpiece by Mr. Olivier Pescheux 🙏🏾🙏🏾 10/10 fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615">KerriZ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 17:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The entire Dityque line feels like a must have in every collection. Orpheon is a great go-to when you just can't make up your mind what you're feeling or the vibe you want to project. it is clean and powdery, but not like swimming in the powder tub. It's fresh and subtle with great lasting power. <br />
<br />
It is a pleasant day spent wondering around a high end department store. Touch the clothes. Breath in the new fabrics while a gentle whiff reminds you the last, and best, stop before you walk out the double glass doors is a visit to the fragrance department.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345497" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="darkforestmags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1170902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="darkforestmags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DedCool/Milk-67819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milk"title="Milk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345497ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345497" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902">darkforestmags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 12:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Deep, green forest, open. Bright and slightly mentholated, with some jasmine whispering in the background. This is a grounded fragrance, earthy and aromatic, but the floral aspect makes it more intriguing and alluring. The cleanest forest dusted with powdery dry shampoo. Refined, a real got-your-shit-together scent. This is really well done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2345497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2345497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338974" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338974" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dlittlegarden"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/400036"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.400036.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dlittlegarden" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Olympea-Legend-54324.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54324.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Olympea Legend"title="Olympea Legend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338974ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338974" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/400036">Dlittlegarden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 10:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first thought is it smells rich and clean and airy, like walking into a grand luxury department store around the holidays right when they open.  The air is fresh in the vaulted galleria, and has a slight evergreen woody scent, along with fancy powders in the cosmetic department and a woody floor wax on the marble.  Later on in the day, I sniffed my arm and got the distinct memory of pulling out a wad of cash from my dad's worn leather wallet.  The smell of cotton/paper, leather and cologne.  Smells like money!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2338974"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2338974#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338875" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2263204">leftthesky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A former friend gave me a sample of this that awakened my interest in perfumes, for which I will be 4ever grateful &lt;3 This was the first niche perfume bottle I purchased for myself, but I ultimately sold it because I realized it doesn’t match my personality at all. I still think it’s extremely beautiful, sophisticated, and complex! However, it’s also too opulent and loud for my taste, which is why I decided to let it go… but it will forever hold a special place in my 🤍. Also its longevity is next level—a truly high-quality fragrance! :3</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2338875"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2338875#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2336443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Really love this one it gives me so much confidence when I wear it out. It reminds me of walking in the rain at night in a romantic way. It smells really clean.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2336443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2336443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332550" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332550" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thewaterlog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232845"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1232845.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thewaterlog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-des-Sens-Eau-de-Toilette-35678.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35678.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"title="Eau des Sens Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332550ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332550" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232845">thewaterlog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 09:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow this is a beautiful perfume, emblematic of Diptyque's elegant vibe and branding. As others mentioned, it's soapy, powdery, and gives a luxurious air of having your shit together. While I might consider it feminine-learning, I think anyone could pull it off. Not quite a skin scent, not quite a floral, it exudes confidence and refinement. I can definitely see this being a year-round signature scent for some.<br />
<br />
I love Diptyque, though I don't quite feel like their offerings fit my personality as well as other houses. I'll gladly spritz my sample of Orpheon when going to the office or visiting clients.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2332550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2332550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; walk in the forest in winter time.<br />

Oh my gosh! <br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312348" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ke3ke3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2101926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ke3ke3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Iris-Malikhan-62617.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62617.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Malikhân"title="Iris Malikhân"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312348ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312348" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926">ke3ke3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 11:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not think I've ever smelled anything that I have loved so much... it is truly a blessing to have this fragrance waft into my nostrils!! Okay, seriously. Orphéon is STUNNINGLY blended.. the notes play together so seamlessly, giving off the most beautiful, clean scent... I truly do not know how to describe this fragrance, but it is my favorite I have ever gotten my nose on... dethroning even my love, Guidance. I'm not even a clean fragrance type of girlie, I am shocked by how much I love this. It's just a stunning fragrance! Falling in love with L'eau Papier, and then discovering Orphéon... I MUST get my nose on the rest of this house!<br />
<br />
An absolutely stunning fragrance. It's clean, beautiful, highly feminine (in MY opinion), classy.. sensual, captivating, intoxicating...just beautiful, I truly cannot say enough nice things about it! I intended for this to be my after-shower fragrance, but I haven't been able to help reaching for it a lot more than that. Perfect for every day, and every occasion. It gives elegance, and class!<br />
<br />
On me, Orphideon performs better than any other fragrance I own. I sprayed it on last night before bed, and well over 12 hours later, it's still on my skin. Impressive, I thought fragrances like that were a myth!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2312348"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2312348#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
