Sadly, a good few minutes into the scent, the juniper berry note is very dominant and over takes the notes i wanted to come forward. I will retest this and try under different weather conditions. I wont give up on you orpheon, not just yet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2309753"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2309753#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306341" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Neckromancer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/968284"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.968284.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Neckromancer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Bubble-Bath-60105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bubble Bath"title="Bubble Bath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/968284">Neckromancer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 20:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is sooo good. I didn't expect to like this based on the notes. I'm not a woody gal. I'm not a powdery gal. But this is so fresh, and I love that it's a little pine-y and a little bitter in THE BEST way. It's sophisticated, and I'm not sophisticated but I feel like I can be with this scent. It reminds me a little bit of ginger-ale, but mixed with Infusion d Iris. The powderiness of this is more on the Infusion d Iris end. but more subtle. It does smell to me like it would have a little bit of citrus, like grapefruit or something. I really want to go to the bar that apparently smells like this. Even though I was a little disappointed that this was named after a bar, and not after Greek mythological things. BUT this does not last on me at all, and it's not cheap, so I don't know what to do, maybe they'll come out with a strong dupe? Come on Dossier!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2306341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2306341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303632" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dayana11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1804123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dayana11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Perpetual-Oud-74201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perpetual Oud"title="Perpetual Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1804123">Dayana11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 10:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This parfume go3s fast from heeeellll noooo to fuuuuuuck yeeees. For me, the opening stinks sooo bad. It's not a pleasant smell, kinda stingy and offensive, but AFTER..... It's like an expensive powder in a room filled with flowers. I LOVE an expensive powder in a room filled with flowers. I don't get much woodyness in this one, but my nose also picks rose?! <br />
I'm ordering the full bottle because....wow</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2303632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2303632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301781" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="annasarahr121"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1018392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1018392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="annasarahr121" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301781ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301781" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1018392">annasarahr121</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 18:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I looove Orpheon...!  I'm also a big fan of juniper berry -- and gin -- they almost smell of turpentine, which I've always liked ever since I smelled it as a child at my neighbor's house (she was a portrait painter who often used oils).    But I can understand how some sniffers find it to be a harsh, almost nuclear smell, particularly at first spritz.  Orpheon has a powdery strength that I also love in Fleur de Peau -- my other favorite Diptyque perfume -- and, to me, smells very unisex and clean.  As it dries down, it becomes more floral and quite woody, though not in any specific way.  Orpheon reminds me a little of another nuclear, though even woodier, fragrance called Bois Imperial (Essential Perfumes), but it may be more similar in quality and longevity than actual smell, and currently I can't find my small bottle to test them side-by-side.  All I can say is that, like Bois Imperial, Orpheon laaasssts, particularly on clothing, and still smells amazing even 3 days later.  If a little harshness of juniper (turpentine!) sounds like your thing, give it a sniff and you might find it absolutely beautiful like I do!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2301781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2301781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="So This Is Paris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1200774.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="So This Is Paris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Pikovaya-Dama-2018-49504.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49504.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pikovaya Dama 2018"title="Pikovaya Dama 2018"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200774">So This Is Paris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 06:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok so I have an odd relationship with this one.<br />
<br />
This is definitely one of those perfumes that I find comforting or off putting simply based on how I am feeling day to day. Some days it behaves beautifully to my nose, other days I instantly want to wash it off. I think it might be my seasonal allergies, although, due to the complicated intricacies of how the human body works, i would not be surprised if my mood alone has an effect on how I perceive scents. Let alone factors like the weather, or how dry my skin is on any particular day, which will of course effect how well a fragrance performs in many aspects. Even your own skin chemistry can change how a perfume performs, even if you spray it side by side with another family member on their arm, even similar skin types might make a fragrance perform differently. It happens. Either way, all I know is that some days this is absolutely gorgeous to me, its clean, airy, I usually get more of the juniper berries and tonka than the powdery notes, but when the powdery notes do come through I really enjoy it the most. For some reason, notes that remind me of alcoholic beverages tend to make me somewhat nauseous. And I don’t know why. I never like the boozy type fragances, but hey, that’s just me. Might be me associating those notes with the fact that I do tend to get sick more often than not when I imbibe alcohol. So when this does emanate those notes over others, i can’t stand it. It comes off pretty quickly. Otherwise, on other days, this is phenomenal. Its long lasting when you want it to be, (although its long lasting when you don’t want it to be too.) And the high quality is undeniably there. Its very well blended. And I can’t say I dislike it, but when I bought a bottle, Diptyque sent me a sample to test before breaking the seal on the full bottle, and i still haven’t opened the full bottle, if that says anything.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2301098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2301098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761040">MasakoHisasueHernandez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 12:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this because I didn’t have any masculine perfume. I didn’t notice when I tried at CDG airport last March, but the powdery scent becomes too much after I came back Barcelona.<br />
<br />
If you are looking for a second hand, please visit Milanuncios, “Eau de perfume de Dyptique.”</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2300322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2300322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Room filling frangrance in an elegant way!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2299650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2299650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299393" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2299393"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2299393#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299232" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mccartneys"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243997"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1243997.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mccartneys" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Bronze-Wood-Leather-52803.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52803.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bronze Wood & Leather"title="Bronze Wood & Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299232ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299232" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243997">mccartneys</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is nice. A straight forward powdery scent from the get go for me. There's a bit of soapiness upon initial application, likely due to the juniper and floral notes. The fragrance develops as wear time goes on until, after about an hour in, when you're left with a strong powder note reminiscent of the dry down of orientals like Coco EdP, albeit just a bit fresher and less dry. Siliage is good; one hour after spraying once at my wrist, my sister asked if I was wearing Orpheon from 6-8 ft away. <br />
<br />
I have a travel size but will not be purchasing a full size as the dry down from Coco is close enough to this for me. If you're looking for a fresher/greener powder scent, this may be for you!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2299232"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2299232#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295703" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295703" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bugbyte"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2264183"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2264183.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bugbyte" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295703ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295703" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2264183">bugbyte</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 08:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like straight old lady on me unfortunately.. definitely understand the person right below me i was scrubbing hard to no avail i still have the scent lingering on my skin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286335" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pas Ce Soir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1565062.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pas Ce Soir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286335ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286335" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565062">Pas Ce Soir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 17:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sadly, I can’t pull this one off. It doesn’t smell good on my skin. I get this nail polish remover smell from it especially in the cloud it forms around me. For that reason, it is also giving me a slight headache. I had two samples from different places due to receiving one in a Lucky Scent sample pack and purchasing one prior. I had this same smell pop up in another fragrance I tested once, Dolce Violet. Now that some time has passed I see other reviews for that fragrance talk about a sharpness that induces headaches. That is what I get with Orpheon. Definitely sample this one to see how it wears on you. I need to go wash this off. Sigh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2286335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2286335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284156" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284062" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nataliemespino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2026248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nataliemespino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284062ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284062" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026248">Nataliemespino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So magical… I’m in love. It’s perfectly powdery, clean, and aromatic from the juniper berry note. It’s so airy and ethereal. It becomes more powdery and musky on my skin, and I’m constantly sniffing it on my arm all day. The powder makes it feel a bit vintage, but it’s not “dusty” at all due to its light and fresh qualities. It’s unisex but leans slightly feminine. It’s absolutely gorgeous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2284062"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2284062#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283898" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2283898" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Odor Aeternitatis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816990"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1816990.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Odor Aeternitatis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2283898ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2283898" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1816990">Odor Aeternitatis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried Orpheon in a store and have not fully worn it but my first impression is very very good. I tried several perfumes on my skin and sniffed my arm throughout the day. The one that captures my attention more and has grown on me was Orheon. <br />
Try this fragrance on your skin to see its magic.Although the notes in the fragrance may seem typical, the overall combination is truly special, which is a strong point for a niche fragrance. It has a pleasant and non-offensive scent, yet it's also quite unique. Unlike other fragrances I tried, Orpheon lasted well on my skin, even on a hot summer day. It's truly an amazing and completely unique fragrance. I highly recommend it as a signature scent. Impressive<br />
8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2283898"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2283898#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278311" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1431064">Piggy41510</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 15:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just picked up this fragrance today for the fall season coming up. My condolences to the family of the great perfumer Olivier Pescheux. I love the sweetness and freshness of this fragrance and diptyque is a fragrance house that I respect due to the natural realistic aroma. Mr. Pescheux is the nose behind the designer fragrance Versace Eros Flame 🔥 which I also love and own. The packaging and presentation is very classy and simple yet elegant and the very nice sales associate at Nordstrom's gave me two nice leather luggage id tags with the diptyque logo. Very happy to have this fragrance in my collection because I'm in love with the scent profile and the story behind it. I'm just starting my purchases of niche fragrances and I'm discovering how unique, transportive and sometimes complex niche fragrances can be and I'm loving this journey and I have a great deal of respect and appreciation for the art of perfumery 🙏🏾❤️.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205745">frozencharlotte</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The second I sampled this, I thought to myself “oh, this is a perfume for Grown Women!” It smells expensive and classy. This might be worth the $200+, I fear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2277059"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2277059#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277029" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277029" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="makingnoscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560173"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1560173.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="makingnoscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Arielle-Shoshana/Monday-84532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Monday"title="Monday"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277029ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277029" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560173">makingnoscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 10:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like it but honestly this smells like a sophisticated Lifebuoy soap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2277029"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2277029#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270684" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mirinanu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2147973"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mirinanu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2147973">Mirinanu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 19:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you’re someone who doesn’t usually enjoy jasmine notes, try orpheon! It might win you over.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2270684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2270684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2257912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2257912" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="villiruusut"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521120"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1521120.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="villiruusut" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Babycat-73149.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73149.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Babycat"title="Babycat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2257912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2257912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521120">villiruusut</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-22">08/22/24 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sampled Orphéon on a blotter card at the boutique yesterday and was not impressed at first. After chatting with the sales representative for a bit, I went back to sniffing the card and was thoroughly smitten. I have been looking for a specific scent that reminded me of bubble baths as a child but never had the right words to describe the scent. I tried finding it in Maison Margiela's Bubble Bath but it always disappoints me and I absolutely loathe the coconut note. I had not expected to find the scent in Orphéon!<br />
<br />
On my skin however, it smells like a sparkly version of vintage Magie Noire (which I absolutely adore) without its deeply animalic notes. Definitely makes sense that it's evoking imagery of forest nymphs and fairies for some! It creates a mysterious scent bubble that keeps people leaning in for more as they go, "What's that smell!" People describe it as being incredibly powdery but on me, it seems to retain the sparkly aldehydic bubble bath scent (this is me sniffing at my wrist 10h later). To me, this is going to be a comfort scent and I have half a mind of scenting my letters and cards to my loved ones with this. Can't believe that I've been sleeping on this one!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2257912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2257912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252535" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaSauvignonBlonde"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205116"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2205116.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaSauvignonBlonde" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Benjoin-Boheme-40942.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40942.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Benjoin Bohème"title="Benjoin Bohème"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252535ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252535" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205116">LaSauvignonBlonde</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 14:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is old money but it’s not Baccarat; it’s Lalique. <br />
<br />
The first time I tried Orpheon I was instantly taken by my childhood memories of joining my socialite &amp; Jessica Walter-esque grandmother on expeditions to marble-floored boutiques with gilted glass countertop displays of lacquer-encased rouges &amp; lambskin leather handbags at Neimen Marcus circa 2000. Orpheon smells warm &amp; rich but not heavy or resinous, with notes of fragrant powder and refined wood. <br />
<br />
For sentimental reasons, I still have a pre-2003 bottle of my grandmother’s Coco Eau de Toilette. Upon comparison, Orpheon has a similar luxurious vintage style, but it doesn’t have the spicy-peach top note or musky-dusty balsamic base that I think dominates Coco. Instead, Orpheon is a drier, cleaner, modernized expression of the same smoky-floral accord. <br />
<br />
Scent Imagery: leather, fine wood furniture &amp; paneling, a fresh cut bouquet of flowers, gin martinis, a gold compact of loose finishing powder, burnout velvet fabrics, a dusty haze of cigarette smoke, a canary-diamond tennis bracelet, Lalique flutes, a bottle of grower champagne, églomisé mirrors, and the sounds of bossa nova &amp; jazz</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2252535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2252535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2251010" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2251010" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rimfafa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2113264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rimfafa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2251010ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2251010" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); Dries slightly powdery. Reminds me of spray deodorant. Decent scent, just not my favorite from Diptyque tbh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2246233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2246233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
