Very fresh and clean</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2246193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2246193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245106" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2245106" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DentiteRFA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206693"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2206693.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DentiteRFA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2245106ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2245106" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206693">DentiteRFA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 13:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfectly unisex. Reminds me of Irish Spring bar soap but in the best way. Projection is nuclear, one spray on my inner elbow and I can smell it for hours. If you want to smell clean and put together, this is the one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2245106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2245106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2244528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2244528" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elgan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2010419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elgan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2244528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2244528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2010419">Elgan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 23:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfect fragrance for people who loves clean fragrances that smells different than other clean perfumes. It opens up with this bitter juniper berries mixed with some woodiness to it. JUST wait until it sets. Once it sets, it becomes a beautiful clean, powdery, aromatic fragrance. It’s not soapy, detergent, nor linen-like. It’s something more earthy, aromatic, woody type of clean. It’s amazing, u guys need to try it. Can be used during the heat and cold. But best in hot weather IMO.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2244528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2244528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242750" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="terez_posp"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216011"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2216011.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="terez_posp" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Iris-Malikhan-62617.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62617.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Malikhân"title="Iris Malikhân"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2216011">terez_posp</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 09:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was so surprised when I read the official description on the website, because I do not get a parisian club at all. To me this screams a woodland fairy dancing in the moonlight, maybe even a forest witch going to town to buy some ingredients for her potions and trying to look elegant and composed. It is perfectly balanced to me, not too woody, not too clean, not too powdery, it has the best of all these worlds though. I am deeply in love with this and getting a full bottle first chance I get.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2242750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2242750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242213" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Embodied~Professor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1780919.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Embodied~Professor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Santal-Majuscule-15547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Majuscule"title="Santal Majuscule"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242213ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242213" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780919">Embodied~Professor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelled Orphéon wafting off a beautiful woman in a white sundress on a train platform in Europe on a swelteringly hot summer day. While I was melting, she looked composed, the Orphéon-scented air a bubble of air conditioning around her. I decided in that moment to buy a bottle at the next possible  opportunity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2242213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2242213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242154" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242154" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cleodemerode27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472508"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1472508.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cleodemerode27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242154ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242154" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472508">cleodemerode27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 17:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I applied it on my skin and it became very screechy, nothing like the beautiful scent from the decant ):  Somehow it becomes more masculine leaning.  It reminds me of a restroom in a bar or a cleaning product we use in Mexico called 'Pinol' that has this synthetic smell of pine and citrics. I wonder if I'm the only one experiencing this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2242154"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2242154#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241231" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DragonflySparrow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/68224"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.68224.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DragonflySparrow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65738.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orphéon Eau de Parfum"title="Orphéon Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241231ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241231" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/68224">DragonflySparrow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 20:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon first spray, this is boozy gin and soapy face powder in a flapper's 1920s nightclub. To me, Orphéon is slightly (?) reminiscent of Chanel No.19 Poudre, but without the dust. Orphéon is more sparkling due to the sharp, herbaceous juniper note. The juniper berries keep it bubbling in champagne, then there's this actual creamy, clean-soap scent dancing with the champagne. If this fragrance was an aesthetic, it would be an upscale lounge, champagne and gin flowing, someone's jasmin musk floats through the air as you sit at the mahogany bar, no smoking allowed, so that's good! Behind the bar is a gorgeous array of glitering bottles and gold elements, and the seats are covered in a deep peacock shaded leather. You can smell the beautiful tonka-vanilla aftershave of the man sittingh next to you, a creamy warm scent. Then you notice who was eminating that subtle jasmine musk when you entered: a sofisticated bobbed brunette flapper powdering her pale skin. She is drinking champagne, and the whole place is bathed in a warm, creamy, dream-like glow. (Wear this while watching Woody Allen's "Midnight In Paris" movie and thank me later.) This is dreamy lipstick and soft powder with a gin and tonic effervesence that settles into the background on a very subtle velvet cloud of jasmin and tonka. Not much sweetness here.... Orphéon would smell amazing on a man. A lovely scent... day/night, office/party. This could be a love - or a hate, depending on your mood.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2241231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2241231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2240966" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rrrouge"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1023834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1023834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rrrouge" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Comme-des-Garcons/Zero-74318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zero"title="Zero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2240966ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2240966" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1023834">rrrouge</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 14:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Comforting, inviting, and a bit nostalgic. There's something in here (the powder?) that reminds me of my childhood and my mother's clothes. The person I imagine when I smell this is elegant, well read, down-to-earth, and hugs like they mean it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2240966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2240966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2240700" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Amanovesky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2214212.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Amanovesky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Liquides-Imaginaires/Blanche-Bete-70189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanche Bête"title="Blanche Bête"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2240700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2240700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214212">Amanovesky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It’s like standing in a forest during a rainstorm, the air thick with the scent of damp earth and whispered secrets. aching melancholy that somehow feels like comfort, as if the very soul of the storm understands quiet longing. <br />
Try listening to Kasamatsu kouji- kaishou while smelling it.<br />
<br />
Long lasting and unique scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2240700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2240700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239414" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OliLernik14"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OliLernik14" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239414ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239414" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274747">OliLernik14</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Took me two years to decide to get this. Originally fell in love with it after trying it on paper strip from normal bottle. It dried down to something I thought was the most impressive "me" scent ever. <br />
Took first sample size from the shop, tried it on but it was never the same dry down. Left me somehow disappointed. Still a lovely smell but not the same experience. After using two full samples I finally decided to invest into the whole bottle. <br />
What really interested me was why so many men were saying they wear it. I mean I had two samples and it did not leave an impression that this is very unisex. It leaned feminine for me. Let me tell you that only after I got myself a full bottle after 2 years of smelling it on paper and two sample sizes, I got shocked with the initial opening of the fragrance from the normal bottle. It does have a very distinct masculine note in it in the opening which I have not smelled before. Maybe cedar here is very strong or some other note that is not listed. But wow! What surprised me was that i did not bother me at all. I kinda like it even more now, as I see it as a perfect leather jacket addition. Gives me very rebellious vibes somehow.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2239414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2239414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2238035" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alyllauren"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1382355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alyllauren" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Ambre-Narguile-2669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"title="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2238035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2238035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1382355">alyllauren</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 16:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this is one of Diptyque’s more impressive scents. It somehow manages to be soft and evoke woods, and it was so gorgeous on my skin chemistry. More of a scent bubble than I’ve ever gotten with this brand, and also more staying power (about 10 hours). I think ultimately it leans a little more powdery than what I’m personally looking for, but it is lovely and I can’t imagine many people disliking this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2238035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2238035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237389" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2237389" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Harmonist/Hypnotizing-Fire-36700.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36700.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotizing Fire"title="Hypnotizing Fire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2237389ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2237389" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538">Kyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 02:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really really like it but for some reason, it kinds of makes me nauseated. <br />
<br />
It opens up with a loud, almost sharp, greenness and freshness coming from the juniper berries, and with every second that goes by, the powdery notes start to be more noticeable; starting as a soft chalky scent in the distance until it becomes a close baby powder type of smell in a matter of 5 minutes. <br />
<br />
I loved it when first sprayed but the longer it went by, the least I enjoyed it. When the juniper and powder notes actually settle in it gives me an smell that reminds me of Meteore and Gentle Fluidity Silver + baby powder, but this mix of freshness and powder appears to be harsh on my nose and edges between the fine line of being nice and being nauseous. <br />
<br />
But I think it’s my nose and not a general experience, because it is indeed an amazing fragrance. <br />
<br />
By the way, this is completely unisex, it does not lean one way or the other.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2237389"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2237389#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233835" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233835" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="reneemaarja"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1985918"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1985918.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="reneemaarja" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65738.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orphéon Eau de Parfum"title="Orphéon Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233835ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233835" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1985918">reneemaarja</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rushed to buy a larger decant from scentsplit after getting a sample in-store and I'm absolutely bathing in it today. What a beautiful, balanced fragrance. I can see why there are a few comparisons to Glossier You, it has similar sparkly powderyness and spice, but Orphéon is much more grounded and sophisticated. Really, this is what I hoped MM Whispers in the Library would smell like- a warm, woody, papery, yet fresh scent. <br />
<br />
The cedar in this is gorgeous- I love the smell of authentic Nordic saunas and that's exactly what I get here. Once in a while, a wave of fresh cedarwood wafts up and it makes me SO happy. This isn't a green scent by any means but it reminds me of taking a hike through the northern taiga, I think the tonka note is giving me warm forest floor covered in pine needles instead of vanilla.<br />
<br />
The copy that Diptyque wrote for this fragrance is beautiful and made me curious about Orphéon but it doesn't smell like a Parisian bar at all. That's fine though, I don't need to smell like cigarettes and tonic water, I much prefer what I do smell. It's been pretty hot outside recently and I've noticed that this smells better indoors with the air conditioner on- I can't wait to wear this in the fall and winter!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2233835"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2233835#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2098962">Nyonka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 09:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was wearing it today during rain and after rain with around +20C and a bit wind, and it worked perfectly! Can smell it around 8 hours, very pleasant and clean woody &amp; berry smell. <br />
<br />
My tries to wear it with a warmer weather, and this was not even half as nice and enjoyable.<br />
<br />
One of my top fragrances for wet weather now!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2229056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2229056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223959" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pinyao1126"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262765"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="pinyao1126" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262765">pinyao1126</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 23:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice clean scent. So good</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2223959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2223959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218764" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218764" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jaylopez2024"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139090"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2139090.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jaylopez2024" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218764ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218764" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2139090">Jaylopez2024</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-14">07/14/24 18:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Diptyque Orphéon perfume is an extraordinary fragrance that will capture your heart with its very first sniff. The composition is a harmonious blend of exquisite notes and accords, creating a scent that is both captivating and alluring.<br />
<br />
The fragrance opens with a burst of freshness, as vibrant citrus notes dance with the warmth of juniper berries. This invigorating combination immediately grabs your attention and sets the stage for the olfactory journey that is about to unfold.<br />
<br />
As the scent develops, the heart reveals a beautifully balanced floral arrangement. The elegant rose petals delicately intertwine with the intoxicating essence of jasmine, creating a bouquet that is both romantic and sophisticated. These floral notes add a touch of femininity and grace to the perfume, making it a perfect choice for any occasion. But is totally unisex.<br />
<br />
The base notes of Diptyque Orphéon perfume leave a lasting impression. Sensual and woody, the fragrance is anchored by the rich and earthy vetiver. It is complemented by the subtle sweetness of vanilla, which adds a comforting and addictive quality to the scent. This unique combination of base notes creates a sense of depth and complexity that is truly enchanting.<br />
<br />
One of the standout features of Diptyque Orphéon perfume is its impressive sillage. With just a few sprays, the fragrance effortlessly fills the air around you, leaving a captivating trail wherever you go. It embodies elegance and sophistication, making it a perfect choice for those who want to make a lasting impression.<br />
<br />
When it comes to longevity, Diptyque Orphéon perfume truly shines. The scent lingers on the skin for hours, gradually evolving and revealing different facets of its character as time goes by. This long-lasting nature ensures that you can enjoy the fragrance's beauty throughout the day, without the need for frequent reapplication.<br />
<br />
In conclusion, Diptyque Orphéon perfume is a true masterpiece that will leave you smitten from the very first sniff. Its perfectly balanced notes and accords, combined with its impressive sillage and longevity, make it a must-have for perfume enthusiasts. Prepare to be captivated by the allure of Diptyque Orphéon perfume and let its enchanting aroma transport you to a world of luxury and elegance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2218764"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2218764#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2217387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2217387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217325" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217325" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VictoriaJune"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1187200"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VictoriaJune" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Sensuous-2938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sensuous"title="Sensuous"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217325ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217325" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2216998" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mausigrl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2051161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2051161.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mausigrl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2216998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2216998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);
