padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2122049" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heychar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217107"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="heychar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2122049ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2122049" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217107">heychar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-11">04/11/24 22:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love love love it, did I mention I love it!<br />
I have purchased various ages/year produced of this perfume and the older ones pre 2016/2017 are the best, seems as though it ages like fine wine, but alas I know they changed the formula. The newer version is lovely also.. just not as warm and oily, also sadly it is without the longevity. The older version is like a hug from your favourite person and you can smell it on your coat the next day.<br />
Definitely an evening sent for me, but I have noticed that I love it more than those around me, to them (family) it’s nice just not as amazing as I think it is.<br />
<br />
Its top 3 for me:<br />
<br />
Satin mood <br />
Oud Bouquet <br />
Les Sables Roses</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2122049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2122049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2119930" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alcsence"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233909"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alcsence" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2119930ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2119930" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233909">Alcsence</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-09">04/09/24 22:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens up clean, fresh, beautiful, modern, and totally unisex, no amber or sweet notes. But then the jasmine and powder emerges and pushes it a little bit into old school feminine perfume. The dry down turns into a fuzzy sweetness that, combined with the jasmine, just feels a little bit off for me as a guy. It's a great fragrance but imo not worth the price for something without a wow factor.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2119930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2119930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Just right down my alley because I'm looking for clean, fresh scents. <br />
<br />
Unfortunately, the dry down changed course into a peppery powdery scent, which reminded me of a rich 65 year old aunty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2116724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2116724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There are also piney, woody notes—noticeable cedar on the dry down, and the initial peppery, resinous juniper berry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2110925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2110925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025545">FleurDeLis69</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 19:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon first spray I thought I would love it, but I quickly couldn't stand it. Smells so much like laundry detergent and soap and that's just not my style. 5/10.<br />
<br />
EDIT: It's growing on me. It's still not the typical scent I would go for, but for a "clean" scent, there's something weirdly intoxicating about it. I could see myself wearing this to the gym or the airport when I want to feel extra "fresh." Still don't know about the powdery note. I have yet to try the rest of Diptyque's parfums, but I hope to find a signature "clean" scent from them that I like soon!<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2109308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2109308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107866" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It smells pretty good, but it doesn't wow me. 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2107866"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2107866#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107145" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2107145" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mgrijalva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2041212.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mgrijalva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2107145ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2107145" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041212">Mgrijalva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-28">03/28/24 13:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fresh and unisex scent , I think it’s right in the middle - doesn’t lean too feminine .. but I can see it leaning a little more masculine … but very slightly.<br />
This is a woody &amp; green fragrance for spring and summer. The longevity is meh. You get better longevity if you spray it on your clothing . On the skin you get maybe 2 hours of wear time. If I had to rate this … it would be 6/10<br />
I love diptyque and I really wanted to love it. It’s just ok.<br />
<br />
The juniper is prominent at the beginning and on the dry down I don’t really get Tonka… it stays pretty green the time it lasts on the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2107145"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2107145#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2103232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2103232" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BandNerdChic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/216191"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.216191.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BandNerdChic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65738.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orphéon Eau de Parfum"title="Orphéon Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2103232ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2103232" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/216191">BandNerdChic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-24">03/24/24 22:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been searching for an androgynous signature, and this is a gorgeous top contender! I wanted a non-linear scent that had woodsy depth and aromatic lightness. I went into the boutique to try a completely different fragrance and walked away with a full bottle of this after testing for a couple hours. I’m still getting to know it, so I will update but here are my thoughts so far:<br />
<br />
Initially, it sprays very clean and herbal. The juniper jumps out along with the white floral. It seems like a clean shower freshie with a masculine gin twist. As it dries down, it goes into a creamy, soapy phase which leans feminine without veering into grandma territory. A little later, I get gorgeous wafts of dry woods but they are so ethereal - when I smell my wrist up close, I just get expensive shampoo with a hint of sweetness from the tonka. If I just smelled this on paper, I would think it is clean and refreshing but so generic and simple. A full wear is highly recommended - the blend is super approachable and unisex, but intoxicatingly layered, interesting and unexpected.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2103232"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2103232#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2099713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2099713" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jessyux3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414607.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jessyux3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tamburins/Chamo-78952.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78952.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chamo"title="Chamo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2099713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2099713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414607">jessyux3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 12:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A great balance of woodsy, spicy, and subtly sweet. Reminds me of Tamburins Chamo with less sweetness and a little more cedar. Layering this fragrance with something sweet and light makes it feel a more youthful. The dry down is sweeter than the initial spray. Also agree with other reviews, the longevity could be better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2099713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2099713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098980" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I saw it in the cdg airport and literally dropped my stuff and ran. Its good just boring imo. Leans too feminine for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2097140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2097140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096987" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2096987" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Oana Emilia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1295938"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1295938.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Oana Emilia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jusbox/Cheeky-Smile-50932.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50932.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheeky Smile"title="Cheeky Smile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2096987ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2096987" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1295938">Oana Emilia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-19">03/19/24 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really regret not buying this fragrance sooner. I remember spraying it in the store for a few times but not really getting it. Until I smelled it on a seller from a fragrance boutique and I immediately fell in love so I bought it. I'm wearing it ever since - summer or winter - and it feels like I am walking barefoot on a august wild flower field. It's earthy, but sweet and soft. I love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2096987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2096987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096382" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2096382" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SuperScents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014931"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1014931.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SuperScents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2096382ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2096382" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014931">SuperScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 12:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts as a fresh, sparkling scent when you first spray. Dazzling, soapy and clean with Jasmine taking the spotlight. It then dries down to a chalky, powdery skin-scent. I can hardly smell it. <br />
<br />
This is Diptique making an effort to create a more "mass-appealing," minimal fragrance for the modern consumer. It still has Diptiqye's Parisian DNA. It's similar to Fleur de Peau, but without the Iris, or even like their Eau de Minthe, just without smelling so old-fashioned. While Orpheon seems to be more popular with women, this is a genderless, unisex fragrance that would suit just about anyone. It's a perfect a dumb-reach for when you don't know what to wear, but still want to smell classy.<br />
<br />
Update: Considering selling my bottle. I wanted to love this, but it just doesn't really do it for me. I'm nauseated by the jasmine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2096382"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2096382#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't know how to describe it, but it smells both like clothes and makeup in expensive shopping malls. Very luxurious and somewhat feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2095052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2095052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2094853" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2094853" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shermillicent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1645089.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shermillicent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Gentle-Fluidity-Gold-53401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentle Fluidity Gold"title="Gentle Fluidity Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2094853ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2094853" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645089">shermillicent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-16">03/16/24 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first high-end perfume I am willing to save my money for. The dry down smells like an expensive woody, powdery scent that envelops me in a luxurious aura, reminiscent of wandering through a forest of rare, aged trees, while simultaneously evoking the softness of freshly powdered petals. It's a fragrance that captivates the senses and lingers delicately, leaving an unforgettable impression wherever I go.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2094853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2094853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2093801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2093801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2090118" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2090118" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eallend"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681789"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1681789.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eallend" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Monde-Gourmand/Santal-Supreme-76829.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76829.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Supreme"title="Santal Supreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2090118ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2090118" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681789">eallend</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-12">03/12/24 07:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>every apt description of this one has already been written, but my anecdote about it hasn't so i'll share that:<br />
<br />
A docent at a museum I visited in Berlin was wearing this one. it was the first instance thus far where i had to stop and cold-call ask someone what they were wearing, because of how immediately it drew me in. if you're out there on fragrantica, you are my definition of cool. totally enhanced my museum trip, and my scent memory is associated with cool modern art, leaves floating off of trees, and dimming late afternoons in autumn.<br />
<br />
i've felt in the past like i've had to enjoy my powdery, sleepy innocent fragrance profiles with a sort of sheepishness, with friends and family wondering why now and then i "smell like a baby" (its not my fault! I'm just drawn to johnson &amp; johnson lotion!), but this scent pushes past the largely held powdery/soapy association and makes that profile entirely its own. the juniper and cedar notes bookend the mature, clean and tasteful powder, making the powder and vanilla notes seem as if found in the wild, discovered in some untouched forest grove.<br />
<br />
i feel like a fawn wearing this honestly. life goal achieved. 10/10 no notes (no pun intended).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2090118"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2090118#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084656" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="petcake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1365715"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1365715.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="petcake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1365715">petcake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 19:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've worn this for the past two days straight; the scent up top makes me feel like a very elegant woman. The drydown is what gets me hooked though; warm dust and clean laundry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2084656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2084656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084352" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="notnati"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1539631.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="notnati" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Skin-35244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Skin"title="Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084352ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084352" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539631">notnati</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would like to thank the girlies who reviewed Orphéon for they did not lie. This was a risky blind buy for me due to the juniper berries and jasmine, but I found me a nice little second hand deal, and this might have just dethroned my beloved Tam Dao. It brings the perfect balance of cool, coniferous freshness with warm powderiness; very subtle and clean smelling; like a perfume, not a soap. Smells natural and of high quality ingredients. I'm not a freshie girl at all, always struggling with fragrances in warmer months, so this will save my summer.<br />
<br />
Longevity is surprisingly good with this one - sprayed one spray on my wrist over six hours ago, took it out on a walk, had a shower, and it's still very much there. Diptyque did it with this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2084352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2084352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2083503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2083503" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kkardaper"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1315044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1315044.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kkardaper" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Cassili-54660.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54660.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cassili"title="Cassili"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2083503ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2083503" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1315044">Kkardaper</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-05">03/05/24 17:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is going to be quite a story, but this fragrance deserves to be described in every possible way. Let's rewind to last summer when I bought a dress from a TikToker I follow (@bookofimmortality – she's cool; go follow her). When I opened the package, this hypnotic smell hit me in the face. I don't know if she sprayed the dress or if she wore it one day, but I was obsessed. I was literally sniffing the dress like a creep. I put it in my closet, and my whole room smelled like it. It was incense-like due to the powdery note... It was amazing. I remember having to contact her just to find out what she was wearing. Unfortunately, I forgot, but I remember it was from this specific house.<br />
<br />
Fast forward to Spring 2024...<br />
<br />
Upon first spray, I knew I had found my mystery fragrance. I almost immediately bought a travel size to experiment with it further. At first spray, you get hit with the spicy juniper, and as it dries down, you pick up the jasmine and powder. It is so fresh and clean, but it's got some spicy sexiness to it as well. The powder is the most prominent note to me, which I like because I think it gives the fragrance an incense-like feel as it merges with the other notes. Orpheon reminds me of listening to Hozier on a foggy spring morning while the frogs croak in the background. It's quiet and quaint, with a beautiful harmony in the distance.<br />
<br />
This is for sure my 2024 spring signature!<br />
<br />
Update: I put this on around 2:00 and I could smell it for a bit, now its 5 and its become a skin only scent. Perhaps its my chemistry, but IMO a fragrance as expensive as this should last longer. I am still in love with it (its like a toxic affair) and will try to buy a bottle but I am a little disappointed in village and longevity. Though a beauty like this might be better only being a mysterious and secretive lady ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2083503"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2083503#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2080091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2080091" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ihateperfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2040867"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2040867.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ihateperfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2080091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2080091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2072234" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="timsmellsg00d"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="timsmellsg00d" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Oud-Satin-Mood-30352.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30352.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Satin Mood"title="Oud Satin Mood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2072234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2072234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830196">timsmellsg00d</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-24">02/24/24 00:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Powdery and aromatic goodness with a touch of creamy woods. It's a good year-round signature but I think Spring is the prime season to wear this because of its lightness and aromatic floral scent profile with Fall being the second best because of the woody and tonka notes. Performance isn't the best and $230 is a lot but that's how the story is with every Diptyque fragrance.<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Performance: 6/10<br />
Price: 6/10<br />
Overall: 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2072234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2072234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2069828" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think the solid version is really decent (and is a beautiful object) and will suit my use of this perfume which is more from time to time rather than a staple in my scent library, emotions oblige, but I definitely recognise it’s quality. Perfectly unisex and lovely</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2062942"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2062942#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062384" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eylulalsat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744158"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1744158.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eylulalsat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1744158">eylulalsat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 15:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After spraying Orpheon on my skin I honestly felt so many different emotions. At first it is a powder bomb that hurt my nose, it smelt like opening an old lady’s closet that haven’t been touched in years. BUT after it settles in oh my god.. Orpheon to me smells like entering a mossy wood cabin in the middle of a green forest. So meditative and smells like a sacred place. I’ve only got a sample and even though I think it is a full bottle worthy perfume, Im not sure if I can pull this off as it is kind of masculine leaning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2056869" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sidesalad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507362"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1507362.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sidesalad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Neroli-Oranger-59058.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59058.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Neroli Oranger"title="Neroli Oranger"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2056869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2056869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1507362">sidesalad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-09">02/09/24 01:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my successful professional scent. Clean, respectible, yet makes those in power make borderline inappropriate comments " did you just wash your hair?, you smell amazing".<br />
Then by the end of the day when it's time to come home it becomes increasingly soft and creamy, rewarding a job well done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2056869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2056869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2056074" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vesperexa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486023"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1486023.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vesperexa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/19-69/Female-Christ-62288.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62288.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Female Christ"title="Female Christ"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2056074ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2056074" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486023">Vesperexa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 09:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is just undeniably lovely. I don't even like soapy smells, and this is soapy, but it's so much more than that. It just smells like pure class and luxury. fwuity's review is absolutely spot on. It's just beautiful. It doesn't smell anything like Le Labo Another 13 really, but I would still say they're cousins somehow because they're both unique, fresh, unusual, classy skin scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1505128">vanessamund</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-06">02/06/24 10:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent almost makes me emotional. It feels like sinking into one of your favorite old memories you had, of those days that you cannot go back to and live again, but can visit when smelling the scent. To me its like a memory in a bottle. Contentment and inner happiness, simplicity and enjoying the small things in life. Its almost like having that moment when you can be in complete presence and silence and youre just in such bliss and contentment with everything you have in life. Youre just laughing and smiling in bed with clean sheets just enjoying every speck of life. Its playful with your senses, it stimulates them while offering you that beautiful piece of sweet nostalgia. Its so innocent and soft.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2053947"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2053947#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051670" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is clean both for woman and man cause the woody scent somehow turn into soapy, like new paper scent of pinguin publisher that you buy from book and beyond. The longevity is moderate, on skin can survive 5 hour-ish, on clothes can do more than 6 hour but the projection is tend to be intimate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050530" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lucysnowe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801974"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lucysnowe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801974">lucysnowe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-02">02/02/24 21:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received my sample from Scent Split after seeing it rec'd as a ~mysterious cool girl scent. Honestly at first I was surprised at the characterization because it leaned super masculine to my nose at first - an "Oh I'd buy this for an artsy older boyfriend who only smokes french cigarettes" type of masculine. And now, after those first heady moments have passed it does have more of a mature, mysterious feminine vibe to it. The powder and jasmine kick in and meld really nicely with the juniper and cedar, creating something that does, in fact, feel truly androgynous. I think if your skin tends to really glom on to powder notes, though, this could get that grandma/grandpa scent that feels more nostalgic than sexy.<br />
<br />
Also...kind of soapy? But I like that. It doesn't feel aggressively obtrusive. A really nice everyday scent imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2050530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2050530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1964595">pinkvariegated</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-31">01/31/24 09:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unreal beauty! Time travel in a bottle. Slips away from you as you try to nail down the notes. Clean like a forgotten fabric softener your grandmother once used. Androgynous in the way that hardwood floors appeal to all. Reminds me of remodeling a Victorian home exactly to your taste while maintaining the integral beauty of the original space. I spray this on my "house sweaters" aka massive sweatshirts worn after showering/over pajamas and inhale them like a fiend all night long. Lasts on fabric/clothing for days and days while always maintaining an innate freshness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2047832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2047832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2044963" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="avanaalst"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934770"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="avanaalst" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Rebul/No-94-66729.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66729.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="No. 94"title="No. 94"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2044963ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2044963" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934770">avanaalst</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-28">01/28/24 12:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If I could force Orpheon into smelling like the opening throughout dry down, I’d be set for life. Alas, it’s not a linear scent and so changes in ways that don’t work for me. The opening is fresh perfection. All the green, woody and floral hit me first. And then, like others have said, you get a cigarette smoke smell about 30 minutes in. I never ever want to smell like cigarettes. And then the final dry down is powdery and sweet. <br />
I do wonder if the solid version would give a more linear interpretation of the scent. Any thoughts?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2044963"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2044963#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2043979" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2043979" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bouchardo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112013.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bouchardo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2043979ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2043979" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112013">bouchardo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-27">01/27/24 16:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Térébenthine, jasmin, fixatif, encens et sueur</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2043979"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2043979#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2041907" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2041907" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ceruleankais"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1967653"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ceruleankais" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/L-Eau-Papier-78658.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78658.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau Papier"title="L'Eau Papier"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2041907ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2041907" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1967653">ceruleankais</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-25">01/25/24 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the fragrance I reach for the most out of all of the ones in my collection. I never normally reach for powdery scents, but this for me takes the cake. Spraying this fills me with the confidence of a straight white man and I am enamoured by it. Intoxicating and irresistible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2041907"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2041907#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037804" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kitko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1983164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kitko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037804ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037804" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983164">kitko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 16:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>subtle and fresh. love a woody perfume with sweet notes--generally i prefer something a little spicier, and stay away from more powdery scents, but i was surprised by how delightful the solid version smells on the skin. it feels very unisex and unobtrusive, and works as a great base layer to mix other scents on (i like to spritz something spicier on top like margiela's whispers in the library / by the fireplace, or a sweeter scent from immortal perfumes like baby vamp). and it's great for any time of day! which is part of why i love having a little solid compact to tap on every now and then.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2037804"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2037804#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2034734" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="autumnrequiem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="autumnrequiem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Orage-49752.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49752.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orage"title="Orage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2034734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2034734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250157">autumnrequiem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 10:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I will forever associate this scent with my first trip to Europe. I bought this at Senteurs d'Ailleurs in Brussels. I stepped in with the idea of getting something that would be unabashedly European but representative of fall, regardless of versatility. I was then suggested this by the SA and I was honestly blown away. <br />
<br />
There is a duality to this perfume that I really, really enjoy. It's fresh but deep. Warm. Calming. Juniper certainly brings gin memories to mind, possibly a nod to the club atmosphere they intend to pay homage to. It also makes for a great soapy scent, so I naturally bought the shower gel as well. Belgium and France are now forever etched in my memory.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="65738"comment_id="2034734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Diptyque/Orpheon-Eau-de-Parfum-65738.html?ccid=2034734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
